allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: F1-01 Multi-LLM API integration with OpenAI and Gemini

- Add multi_llm.py service for parallel LLM querying with fallback
- Add llm.py API endpoints \(/query, /health, /providers\)
- Register LLM router in API v1
- Update config to use gemini-2.0-flash model
- Export MultiLLMService and MultiLLMResponse from llm module
- Add proper error logging for all exception handlers

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: Add Stitch UI/UX reference designs for enterprise dashboards

- Strategic GEO Performance Analysis Dashboard
- Brand Safety & Risk Control Center
- Global GEO Pipeline & Approval Workflow
- Enterprise ROI & Settlement Hub
- Comprehensive design system documentation

Reference implementations for future frontend development.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
